name: Fast Forward Consult
goal: As a self-employed consultant, I provide consultancy services for interested clients. This is mainly but not exclusively in the European policy domain.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: At this stage, I do not follow any particular files in particular, but am generally interested in following agriculture, healthcare, environment, education as well as international relations domains.
